translations: v.帮助，扶持；对……有帮助，有助于；搀扶，带领；给（人）拿（食物等）；私自拿走，窃取；无法避免，忍不住；减轻（疾病的）症状（help 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 伸出援助之手， 助一臂之力

sentences.sentence: She gave them extra helpings of ice cream.
sentences.translation: 她额外给了他们几份冰激淋。

sentences.sentence: You greedy pig! You've already had two helpings!
sentences.translation: 你这个馋嘴！你已经吃了两份了！

sentences.sentence: There are large helpings of escapism in these movies.
sentences.translation: 这些电影中有大量逃避现实主义的表现。
